title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 582.9 - Submission of rivers system land management plans by local governments
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 582.9 - Submission of rivers system land management plans by local governments

State Regulations
(a) Local
governments are encouraged to submit a rivers system land management plan
relative to river areas in their jurisdictions in accordance with section
577.9
of these
regulations. (b) Upon agency
approval, a rivers system land management plan shall apply in lieu of agency
jurisdiction over the river area involved pursuant to Part 577 of these
regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
582.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
